topic.title: Hey guys. I am in love with a girl, but I will go to Canada for university next month.
topic.body: I am depression, so does she. I knew her from facebook cause we both love anime. However, when we talked about ourselves, she told me she got a real bad childhood. Her dad always wanna a son so she was beaten by her dad from time to time. After we first hang out together and I felt myself in love with her. I really wanna protect her and help her. Sadly, I am going to canada next month and she stay. I really don't know what to do. Should I told my feeling or just hide it forever?

1_1FoBePyJrNaeE6ik2eukxFHG8MKhGVRAy3.body:
> [nilarsen](#comment_5_1EHKf4dc4beZ4d2cFwW7VgDDmzjkNY5JAj): You should tell her how you feel and say you will be back for her.

Yeah, I thought about it, but during the time I cannot take care of her. And she is depression, if something goes wrong I am afraid she will heart herself.

> [castor](#comment_1_17FzNZd5PbUzERka61GCYUrqjV25MCfusj): Do you want talk with her dad?> [jaspppppper](#comment_4_1JuJzy7nP1eBDojviCHFZYs36AftHQ5BmE): You can't hide that feeling if you really love her.Just be a man,and split all of them out.

Dude, it's not that easy. What if she is sick or get hurt. I can't be there for her. Maybe there will be a better man taking care for her in the future... I will jealousy of course but I think she may deserve better.

> [castor](#comment_1_17FzNZd5PbUzERka61GCYUrqjV25MCfusj): Dude, it's not that easy. What if she is sick or get hurt. I can't be there for her. Maybe there will be a better man taking care for her in the future... I will jealousy of course but I think she may deserve better.

Sorry dude, I wrong replying . I am not familiar with her dad.

> [jaspppppper](#comment_4_1JuJzy7nP1eBDojviCHFZYs36AftHQ5BmE): Dude, it's not that easy. What if she is sick or get hurt. I can't be there for her. Maybe there will be a better man taking care for her in the future... I will jealousy of course but I think she may deserve better.

Dude, it's not that easy. What if she is sick or get hurt. I can't be there for her. Maybe there will be a better man taking care for her in the future... I will jealousy of course but I think she may deserve better.

> [nilarsen](#comment_7_1EHKf4dc4beZ4d2cFwW7VgDDmzjkNY5JAj): Don't you think there is a higher chance of her hurting herself if you don't tell her how you feel? A long distance can work if you truly love each other. I know from experience.

If I just hide it, we can just be friends. Perhaps she will find someone else.

> [superkyo2008](#comment_3_1BuXYwxka4uV2V5441rNQYYPUDJrz7SLF3): In my opinion, shouldn't people in the west be very direct? Why do I think this guy is very vague, more ambiguous than our Orientals?

I am not an sociable person. Perhaps it make me a freak.
